Pyro/Breakdown/Scavenger:



Breakdown, Pyro, and Scavenger saw the Predacons standing around like idiots. 
 They chuckled, telling Dark One, who waited outside patiently.

Breakdown raised his grenade, firing a grenade off at Marine's pelvis from 
behind, which was set to explode on impact.

Pyro raised his flame thrower, firing three fireballs at Inferno's back.

Scavenger raised his chaingun, firing 20 armor-piercing shells off at the 
back of Rampage's knees.
